輣字的基本解释

輣
péng
古代的一种战车：“戎车七征，冲輣闲闲。”

輣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
［《廣韻》薄萌切，平耕，並。］
(1)即輣车。
(2)象声词。参见“輣軋”。

輣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第09
【廣韻】薄庚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。【說文】兵車也。【史記·淮南王傳】作輣車。　又【廣韻】樓車也。【後漢·光武紀】䡴輣撞城。【註】䡴，陷陣車。輣，樓車也。【通雅】渠衝、䡴輣，皆臨衝也。互詳後䡴字註。

輣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輣字的起名意思

暂无。

輣
Basic explanation of words
輣
péng
A kind of ancient chariot: "Seven military chariots, rushing for leisure."
輣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" Bo Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
["Guangyun" thin cut, flat plowing, combined. ]
(1) That is the car.
(2) Onomatopoeia. See "shoulder".
輣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輣; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 Page 09
[Guangyun] Bo Gengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Pu Gengqie,? Yinpeng. [Said the text] Soldiers too. [Historical Records · Huainan Wang Biography] as a car.　[Guangyun] The car is also on the floor. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] smashed into the city. [Note] 塴, the car is stuck. He, the car is also upstairs. [Tongya] Qu Chong and Qiao Liao are both in front of the Chong. Note the words after mutual details.
輣
